abilities.name: Grasping Tendrils
abilities.rule: Each time an enemy unit (excluding **TITANIC** units) within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army with this ability is selected to Fall Back, you can roll one D6: on a 3+, that enemy unit must Remain Stationary instead.

abilities.name: Hypertoxic Miasma
abilities.rule: At the end of your Movement phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of this model: on a 2-3, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 4-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
